    import java.util.*;
    import java.util.Map.Entry;
    class TECH04
    {
        public static void main(String args[])
        {
            Scanner br=new Scanner(System.in);
            int T,i,l;
            String S="zzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzz",G="zzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzz";
            char p=' ';
            T=br.nextInt();
            while(T--!=0)
            {
                Map<Character,Integer>map1=new HashMap<Character,Integer>();
                Map<Character,Integer>map2=new HashMap<Character,Integer>();
                S=br.next();
                G=br.next();
                //System.out.println(S);
                //System.out.println(G);
                if(S.length()!=G.length())
                    System.out.println("NO");
                else
                {
                    l=S.length();
                    for(i=0;i<l;i++)
                    {
                        p=S.charAt(i);
                        if(map1.get(p)==null)
                        map1.put(p,1);
                        else
                            map1.put(p,map1.get(p)+1);
                    }
                    for(i=0;i<l;i++)
                    {
                        p=G.charAt(i);
                        if(map2.get(p)==null)
                        map2.put(p,1);
                        else
                            map2.put(p,map2.get(p)+1);
                    }
                    //System.out.println(map1);
                    //System.out.println(map2);
                    int f=0;
                    for(Entry<Character,Integer> entry : map1.entrySet())
                    {
                        Character key= entry.getKey();
                        //for(Character key2:map2.keySet())
                        if(map1.get(key)!=map2.get(key)||key!=key)
                        {
                            //System.out.println(key+" "+key+" "+map1.get(key)+" "+map2.get(key));
                            f=1;
                            break;
                        }
                    }
                    if(f==1)
                        System.out.println("NO");
                    else
                        System.out.println("YES");
                }
            }
        }
    }
